TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "barrier", "quantity": 35, "index": 13}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "orange_dye", "quantity": 42, "index": 22}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 49, "index": 27}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 14, "index": 29}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 38, "index": 30}, {"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 58, "index": 31}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 52, "index": 36}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 38}, {"type": "chain", "quantity": 26, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft lime_stained_glass, I need to craft 8 glasses, and 1 lime dye. To craft the lime dye, I need to craft 1 green dye and 1 white dye. To craft the white dye, I need to smelt the sand at slot 38. Therefore I will smelt the sand at slot 38 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 38 to slot 11 with quantity 1
